title: LiveEdutvICO
author: LiveEdutvICO
content: Having known that, Education Ecosystem is one of the project that has a good use case when it comes to tech space, crypto space and education space. Would be lovely to stick close to this project as they will be unveiling lots of goodies in time to come. If you are yet to follow them on the social media space, what are you waiting for ? You are one step to the clicks, visit : EDUCATIONECOSYSTEM

comments.author: Anonylz
comments.body: How many education projects do you know in blockchain that has made any impact? I really haven't seen any making an impact like the rest of the project from other trends. I have seen a few education-related projects in the past but unfortunately, they could not make any impact on this ecosystem. Ledu is not an exception either, education ecosystem may have a good use case but no project has been able to truly explore and utilize it.
